title: Update Customer Shipping Address
description: A customer logs into their online account to update their default shipping address.

tasks.description: Log into their account and navigate to the 'Address Book' section.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accesses the area to manage their saved addresses.
The customer accurately enters their new address details.

tasks.description: Set the new address as their default shipping address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Future orders will now default to shipping to the new address.
